text: mokada dannawada minihage miya marila.

eheth ee naya pramanaya laba dima sandaha chinaye ‘chayina habar samagamata’ hambanthota waraya godanagime konthraththuwa bhara diya yuthu bawa chinaya kiya athi bawa, ee dinawala amarikanu thanapathi karyalayen nikuth wunu kebal paniwidayak haraha, wikiliks anawaranaya karagena thibe.
jayagrahanaya sandaha lakunu 217 ka ilakkayak hambaagiya dakunu palath kandayamata oowara 43.2 k awasanaye siyalu dena dawi labagatha hakiwuye lakunu 143 k pamani.
maha aleksandar rajuge guru wu pleto pandithuma maha widwatheki, namuth ohuda aleksandar rajuta lowa pathali thatiyak lesa uganwiya.

eeye paswaruwe wiharasthanaya wetha giya janadhipathithuma palamuwa aagamika wathawathwala nirathawa aashirwada labagath athara, anathuruwa abhinawa chaithya rajayananwahansege kotha nirawaranaya kirimata adala samaru palakaya nirawaranaya karanu labiya.
dan nawathath owun ranilta kande yamata sarasemin sitithi.

atampitiya – rathna wirasinha ← pohottuwe mahindage bulath kole postar horata gahala – gammanpila oo lewal ganitha prashna pathraye asadharanayakata ida thaban na – wibhaga komasaris → ridi rayaka wichithrathwa ya…
basaya enathuru maga bala hun sudu maniketa boho welawata galle gatha kala jiwithaya mathak weyi.dimbaulagala men nowa galle jiwithaya dushkara natha.

ada noweyi heta yannayi sinhalayange prathipaththiya.

mage gawa sankhyalekhana nathiunath mama pahadiliwa danna deyak thamayi godak joduwalata hotal kamarekata gihilla wade karaganna lajjawa nathiunath ee ayata pamasiyakata gihilla kondam pakat ekak illanna lajjayi.

eeka anek hama dekatamath wada wadagath watinakamakthiyana mulikathwaya diyayuthu aayojanayak.
mama ma melowin pitath wimata payakata pera pamita dena lesatath eeta pera kumana hethuwakatawath meya wiwrutha nokarana lesath danwa wilista mema lipiya dunnemi.
ampara, widyananda maha piriwena idiripita pradeshaye tayar karmantha shalawak ginigena winasha wi thibe.
mehidi karyanshaye siyaluma anshawala sewawan labagatha haki durakathana namawaliya amathyathumata bharadima karyanshaye samanyadhikari harischandra batagoda mahatha wisin sidukarana ladi.

wu pamaninma kenekuge sitha pina yayi.
me pramanaya aayathanaye abhimathaya anuwa wadi karala dennath puluwan.
obata mese sithiya hakiyi.
“minis loke jiwathweddi mahasona – ririyaka – kali yakshani – gana ahala thibuna.
ee nisa ada dawase eya duru kirima sandaha sama kenekugema sahayogaya awashyayi.

mema wasare gatha wu masa kihipaya thula polisiyata erehiwa pamili 600k jathika polis komisama wetha labi athi bawath, polisiya pakshagrahiwa kriya kirimanithiya harihatikriyathmaka nokirimasaha balaya ayuthu lesa yodagena kriyakirimayana siddhin sambandhayenmema pamili labi athi bawa jathika polis komisamasandahan karayi.

nagara sabha mathiwaranayen pasu dina puwathpathwala wiwidhakarayen ehi prathipala wigraha kara thibuni.

soniya gandhi pakshaya dinawanna gemata bassata rata karanawanne ithama ugath buddhimath mathak dakwa dushitha lebalayak gahagaththe nathi man mohan , habayi soniyata ooni de thamayi pakshaya athule wenne , sajithla , dayala pakshaya dinawala ranilta rata palanaya karanna dila bala inna tharam namya shili na , untath ooni balaya .

eeth ketiyen kiyanawa nam sudda enna kaliyen samanya unta adhyapanayak thibune na.

sirima - shasthri giwisuma athsan kirimedi ema giwisume ee bawa sandahan kota athi bawa ki ema niladhariya bathimathun samanga paminena wya parikayin saha wenath pudgalayan regu nithirithi walata patahani dewal ragena eema walakwimata ema niladharin kachchathiwu dupathata paminena bawath sadahan kaleya.

2000 warshaye aarambha karana lada lanwima daththa satahan kriyakaruwange sangamaye nawarathna wijekon mahatha aarambhaka widhayaka sabhikayeki. 2002 warshaye ema sangamaye upa lekam lesa pathwiya. 2003 warshaye lanwima daththa satahan kriyakaruwange sangamaye sabhapathi padawiyata pathwuye aatha dushkara monaragala wani pradeshayakin lanwima wani dawantha aayathanayaka athi wruththiya samithiyaka sabhapathi padawiyata pathwu labalama pudgalaya lesa ithihasayata ekwemini. 2004 – 2007 kalaya thula ema sangamaye (kalapa 3) hi upa sabhapathi lesa katayuthu kara 2008 wasaredi nawatha sabhapathi padawiyata pathwiya. 2009 wasare sita ehi (kalapa 3) hi upa sabhapathi lesa katayuthu karamin siti.
